title: The Biscuit Bullet
subtitle: A woman sitting in a car thinks she's been shot when a canister of biscuit dough explodes.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: A woman sitting in a car is convinced she’s been shot when a loud bang is immediately followed by an impact to her head, producing a sticky mass on her cranium. The ‘brains’ she tries to hold in turn out to be biscuit dough from an exploded can.
